fr.emn.easymol.core
Class Atom

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--fr.emn.easymol.core.Atom
Direct Known Subclasses:
MoleculeNode
public class Atom
extends java.lang.Object

The class for Atom Modelization in the EasyMol software

This class provides a simple API to manipulate Atom objects. It modelizes an atom using its type and its valence. The type of the atome is an integer (the most common atoms are implemented using the constants H,C,O,N ... ). There is also a special constructor to automatically set the valence of the atom knowing its type. So an atom can be created by

Atom a = new Atom(Atom.H)

See Also:
MoleculeNode, Molecule
